title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 June 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:04 <polx> from 1.5.4 to 3.5.1  
00:04 <polx> No 4 yet!  
00:08 <@cjd> there is quite a bit which changed over that span  
00:09 <abusenius> has quit  
00:09 <polx> but is there a way to compute/get a list of things done there?  
00:10 <polx> E.g. we have 250000 users... some things such as going through them as it seems to be doing are likely to take eternally!  
00:10 <@cjd> let me take a look, the code is pretty easy to read in that area  
00:11 <polx> Oh, that'd help!  
00:13 <rrodriguez> has quit  
00:13 <jvdrean> has quit  
00:16 <@cjd> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R15428XWIKI2977DataMigration.java  
00:17 <@cjd> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R35100XWIKI7564DataMigration.java  
00:18 <@cjd> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R35101XWIKI7645DataMigration.java  
00:19 <@cjd> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/store/migration/hibernate/R35102XWIKI7771DataMigration.java  
00:19 <@cjd> Those are the ones you should expect to be running  
00:19 <polx> interesting, are they all listed in the parent dir?  
00:20 <@cjd> R40000XWIKI6990DataMigration.java is a massive change and IIRC it pulls in some liquibase stuff which is outside of that tir  
00:20 <@cjd> but if I'm not mistaken (Denis knows more about this) all of the migrators are still in that directory.  
00:21 <polx> what about LegacyDataMigration ? How can I recognize it is done?  
00:22 <@sdumitriu> That one probably isn't executed  
00:22 <@sdumitriu> Here "legacy" means "before 0.9.x"  
00:23 <polx> ;-) !!  
00:23 <polx> Man, we're modern.  
00:27 <npm> XWiki talks to gpodder.net: http://www.nielsmayer.com/bin/view/Sandbox/gpotest  
00:28 <npm> http://www.nielsmayer.com/bin/view/Sandbox/gpotest?viewer=code  
00:39 <npm> the US federal aviation administration uses XWiki: https://nfdc.faa.gov/ :-)  
00:39 <ssavi> has joined #xwiki  
00:40 <@sdumitriu> Nice  
00:54 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
00:56 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki

08:47 <CIA-35> tmortagne master \* r7b5e6da https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/7b5e6dad18aeb62c221a38ca0f802642d1d18202 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiAttachment.java : XWIKI-7835: Webdav uploading an attachment with + character in filename fails leaving duplicate attachments in hibernate session. - http://git.io/lTX\_Uw  
08:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:52 <vmassol> good morning  
08:52 <vmassol> fyi here's a comparison between XWiki commons 4.0 and 4.1 on sonar: http://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/4779a99c-177d-4a9a-8d2d-12b360317a98/e89fd7908a950801c1f527c0d3f4dd6d  
09:06 <+Denis> polx: legacy is only run on a database that have never seen a migrator system in its life before. It is really minor, only some cleanup. You should not worry about it.  
09:10 <Denis> has quit  
09:14 <Inge-> hmm. I am getting Form too large saving a page where I paste in a Word document (Form too large397131>200000) running the default executable with jetty - even though xwiki-start.bat should be overriding the default 20K to 1mb (and I have set another almost similar property as well, that I found online):  
09:14 <Inge-> set XWIKI\_OPTS=%XWIKI\_OPTS% -Dorg.mortbay.jetty.Request.maxFormContentSize=1000000  
09:14 <Inge-> set XWIKI\_OPTS=%XWIKI\_OPTS% -Dorg.mortbay.http.HttpRequest.maxFormContentSize=1000000  
09:18 <@sdumitriu> Inge-: It's no longer org.mortbay, but org.eclipse  
09:19 <rrodriguez> has quit  
09:19 <Inge-> ah  
09:19 <@sdumitriu> Try org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request.maxFormContentSize  
09:20 <@sdumitriu> The name changed between Jetty 6 and Jetty 7  
09:21 <@sdumitriu> And who did the upgrade forgot to update that setting as well...  
09:22 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:22 <Inge-> That worked like a charm :)  
09:22 <Inge-> thanks.  
09:33 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:42 <@sdumitriu> cjd: Are you up?
